subject: Definitions question
msgSnippet: We re having some robust discussions about testing here and one of the big issues concerns correct nomenclature for testing types and levels and scopes. Does
messageBody:
We're having some "robust" discussions about testing here and one of the big issues concerns correct nomenclature for testing types and levels and scopes. Does anyone have any book recommendations to help with industry accepted terms and definitions? I have seen references to "The Art of Software Testing" by Glenford Myers that describe it as the seminal work on the matter. Is that book worth getting? Is there a website anywhere that has "standard" definitions that my co-workers and I can use for enlightenment on this matter?

All wisdom on this matter will be greatly appreciated.

Simon

-----------------------------------------------------------------
Simon P. Chappell simon.chappell@...

"Some problems are so complex that you have to be highly intelligent and well-informed just to be undecided about them." - Laurence J. Peter
